subject: Loving Is Living
text:
Real love is a living thing,
 A giving thing,
 A feeling thing,
 A gusty thing,
 It swings!
 Not closed, jealous
 Stingy or dead,
 It moves!
 A freeing thing,
 A seeing, timely,
 Hearing, electric thing,
 Not controlling,
 Dogmatizing or closed,
 Loving is a 
 Living Thing!
